description: Dean Lofts is a true wizard in the world of DevOps! Not only are they an expert in their field, but they also have a huge passion for open source. They have been extremely helpful and supportive to me and the entire EddieHub community. They are truly a delight to work with and I feel so lucky to be in a common community with them. I send them all my love and appreciation
